description:
After finishing their "debut," Kate, Emilico and three other pairs who started with them begin a new life as adults. With the mystery of the "Shadows House" still unsolved, a new incident occurs in the children's wing. Kate and Emilico, whom the Star Bearers suspect of being malcontents, investigate a mysterious robed Shadow who may be the culprit.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Slavery
tags.description: Prominently features slaves, slavery, or slave trade.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Butler
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a butler.

tags.name: Cosmic Horror
tags.description: A type of horror that emphasizes human insignificance in the grand scope of cosmic reality; fearing the unknown and being powerless to fight it.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Drugs
tags.description: Prominently features the usage of drugs such as opioids, stimulants, hallucinogens etc.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

node.description:
[Official Website](http://so-ma-to.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/somatoma) | [Blog](http://somatoblog.blog31.fc2.com/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=422553)

A mangaka duo consisting of writer and designer Nori (のり) and artist Hisshi (ひっし), who were former assistants of Saitou Pro, the manga studio of [Takao Saitou](https://anilist.co/staff/97907/).
He did photography work initally. Also adept in animating.
Jie Ren is a CG artist.

He is an art director and supervisor, who was a long time member of Bihou until 2007 when he went to head the background art department in Totonyan. He belongs to the anime production group Neko-Nanban-Tei together with director Watanabe Takashi and his wife Miyata Naomi.

__Hometown:__ Saitama City, Saitama Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Omiya Koryo High School and SHOBI College of Music

[Profile (One Music)](https://one-music.jp/suehiro/index.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kenichiro_s) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/kenichiro.suehiro)

A Japanese pianist, composer, and arranger.

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDGKZdgRlP__KOCgC58WeWA/featured) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/reo_peko/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/xoxleoxox) | [Website](https://www.reona-reona.com/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/intl-pt/artist/2SIBY7Jwq1kYng12Zguo3C) 

A Japanese female pop singer under the label SACRA MUSIC, who was a finalist of the 2017 SACRA MUSIC audition. She debuted as "Elsa Kanzaki" (a character in Sword Art Online) on July 4, 2018 with the character mini-album ELZA and as "ReoNa" on August 29, 2018 with the single SWEET HURT.

__[Website](http://www.clarismusic.jp/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ClariS_Staff)__ | __[Artist Page (Sacra Music)](https://sacramusic.jp/artist/#claris)__ | __[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/ClariSofficial)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-zeaPnxZHE3EcTyVl1fTdw)__

__Formed:__ 2009
__Genres:__ J-POP, Synthpop, Pop rock, Anison

__Biography:__
ClariS is a Japanese singing group under record label [Sacra Music](https://sacramusic.jp/) (2017-), having previously been under [SME Records](https://www.sme.co.jp/s/SME/company/SML?ima=3832) (2010-2017) the group consisted of two high school girls who gained popularity through the video sharing site Nico Nico Douga as “アリス☆クララ" ("Alice☆Clara") in 2009 and 2010. They have since changed their name to “ClariS” for their major debut in 2010, which means “sunny, clean and bright” in Latin. Since they were still high school students and wanted to focus on their school studies, they would not reveal their identities. Therefore, they would only be shown as illustrations. They both started their high school education in April 2012, according to their official Twitter.  When drawn, Clara is depicted wearing pink items, and Alice is shown wearing blue items. Images of the crescent moon are used as a motif to represent Clara, and the sun is used to represent Alice, which comes from their personal preferences. Clara is shown with slightly wavy hair and no bangs, while Alice is drawn with straight hair with bangs.

In 2014, Alice left ClariS to focus on her studies. Clara was then joined by her friend Karen whom she met when they were classmates at the same music school. When drawn, Karen is depicted wearing pastel green items, and images of stars are used to represent her.

On the 1st September 2024, ClariS Karen announced her graduation after ClariS AUTUMN TOUR 2024.

__Members:__
- Clara (クララ) (2009-)
- Ellie (エリー) (2025-)
- Anna (アンナ) (2025-)

__Former Members:__
- Alice (アリス) (2009-2014)
- Karen (カレン) (2014-2024)
He did photography work initally. Also adept in animating.
